bio: She might come across as a hard-nosed taskmistress, but really she just wants the best for her team.

soultimate.name: Shiny Snowdrifts
soultimate.description: A pillar of ice appears to hit foes for lots of damage.

skill.effect: 3% Atk, 21% Def, 2.4% Spd and 6% MM boost for allies.
